      • getTitle

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.lang.String getTitle()

        Gets the top-most string which is displayed on the scoreboard. (doesn't have a score on the side). Be aware that this can contain color codes.

        Returns:
        the scoreboard title

      • getLines

        @JvmStatic
 @JvmOverloads
 @NotNull
public static java.util.List<com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.Scoreboard.Score> getLines(boolean descending)

        Get all currently visible strings on the scoreboard. (excluding title) Be aware that this can contain color codes.

        Returns:
        the list of lines

      • getLineByIndex

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.Scoreboard.Score getLineByIndex(int index)

        Gets the line at the specified index (0 based) Equivalent to Scoreboard.getLines().get(index)

        Parameters:
        index - the line index
        Returns:
        the score object at the index

      • getLinesByScore

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static java.util.List<com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.Scoreboard.Score> getLinesByScore(int score)

        Gets a list of lines that have a certain score, i.e. the numbers shown on the right

        Parameters:
        score - the score to look for
        Returns:
        a list of actual score objects

      • setLine

        @JvmStatic
public static void setLine(int score,
                                      @NotNull
                                      java.lang.String line,
                                      boolean override)

        Sets a line in the scoreboard to the specified name and score.

        Parameters:
        score - the score value for this item
        line - the string to display on said line
        override - whether or not to remove old lines with the same score
